alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 09 at 8:53PM CST until March 09 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Southern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... North central Nacogdoches County in eastern Texas... Northwestern Shelby County in eastern Texas... East central Cherokee County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 852 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Salem, or 16 miles southwest of Henderson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Garrison, New Salem, Minden, Trawick, Cushing, Appleby, Mount Enterprise, Reklaw, Lawsonville, Glenfawn, Brachfield, Dotson and Laneville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
